mapper.insert: insert into notice (nidx, userid, title, content, viewcnt) values (seq_notice.nextval, #{userid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewcnt})
insert into notice (nidx, userid, title, content, viewcnt, filename, orgname, filesize) values (seq_notice.nextval, #{userid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewcnt}, #{filename}, #{orgname}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT nidx, userid, title, content, viewcnt, substr(WRITEDAY,1,10) as writeday, filename, orgname, filesize FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rno, nidx, userid, title, content, viewcnt, writeday, filename, orgname, filesize FROM notice WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY nidx DESC ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startRno} AND #{endRno}
SELECT nidx, userid, title, content, viewcnt, substr(WRITEDAY,1,10) as writeday, filename, orgname, filesize FROM notice WHERE nidx = #{nidx}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 WHERE nidx = #{nidx}
UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, filename = #{filename}, orgname = #{orgname}, filesize = #{filesize} WHERE nidx = #{nidx}
update notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, filename = #{filename}, orgname = #{orgname}, filesize = #{filesize} where nidx = #{nidx}
mapper.select: SELECT nidx, title FROM notice WHERE nidx = ( SELECT MAX(nidx) FROM notice WHERE nidx < #{nidx} )
